desc: Starfire Direct is your preferred source for all things fire! Discover a large selection of fireplaces, fire pits, patio furniture, gas logs, and more.

layout.text: FIRE PIT & FREE STARFIRE GLASS + BURNER COVER
Get free Starfire Glass (1/2" Azuria, change color on request.) and a burner cover with the purchase of a Round Beton. Free shipping available.* Hurry while supplies last.
